FAQ's

Frequently Asked Questions

What materials are your jewelry made of?

Our luxury jewelry is crafted from high-quality materials such as 18k gold, sterling silver, platinum, and precious gemstones to ensure longevity and style.

How do I care for my jewelry?

To keep your jewelry looking its best, store it in a dry place, clean it with a soft cloth, and avoid exposure to water, lotions, or perfumes. Regular maintenance and polishing can help retain its shine.

What is your return/exchange policy?

We offer returns and exchanges on unworn, undamaged jewelry within 30 days of purchase. Custom or personalized pieces are non-refundable.
